revision.text: Welcome to the global portal for documentation, news, and other information about the Systems Biology Graphical Notation (SBGN) project, an effort to standardize the graphical notation used in maps of biological processes. The following links will bring you to the more popular pages of the website. Much more is available though. Explore using the top menu. {|width="100%" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:1.5em;" | align="center" style="padding:15px;"| [[Documents/Specifications | Specifications]] | align="center" style="padding:15px;"| [[SBGN_Software | Software ]] | align="center" style="padding:15px;"| [[Documents/Examples | Examples ]] |- | align="center" style="padding:15px;" |[http://www.biopax.org/harmony.php Next meeting] | align="center" style="padding:15px;" |[https://utils.its.caltech.edu/mailman/listinfo/sbgn-discuss Discussion] | align="center" style="padding:15px;" |[[Quote | Cite ]] |} SBGN is the work of many people. It would not have been possible without the generous [[Contacts#Funding | support of multiple organizations]] over the years, for which we are very thankful. {{NewsPage}}
